text: True Crime is a 1999 American mystery thriller movie directed by Clint Eastwood. It is based on Andrew Klavan's 1995 novel of the same name. Eastwood also stars in the movie as a journalist covering the execution of a death row inmate, only to discover that the convict may actually be innocent. The movie also starts Isaiah Washington, James Woods, Denis Leary and LisaGay Hamilton. The movie was released on March 19, 1999 to mixed reviews. ==References== Category:1999 mystery movies Category:1999 thriller movies Category:American mystery movies Category:American thriller movies Category:Movies directed by Clint Eastwood Category:Movies based on books Category:Warner Bros. movies
title: True Crime (1999 movie)
